statement.p: Explain why the vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} 5 \\ 0 \\ 5 \\ 3 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ 2 \\ 3 \\ -6 \\ 4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ 4 \\ -2 \\ -2 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} 14 \\ -6 \\ -4 \\ 21 \\ -13 \end{array}\right] are linearly dependent or linearly independent.

answer.p: The vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} 5 \\ 0 \\ 5 \\ 3 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ 2 \\ 3 \\ -6 \\ 4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ 4 \\ -2 \\ -2 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} 14 \\ -6 \\ -4 \\ 21 \\ -13 \end{array}\right] are linearly dependent .
